title: Their Lucky Star Was Transmigrated! - Novel Updates
tags: Child Protagonist   Familial Love   Family   Family Business   Female Protagonist   Pregnancy   Transmigration
author: Flawless
description:
Green smoke is coming out of the Xu family's ancestors' grave! 

Mrs. Xu, who is already a grandmother, is pregnant! 

Mr. Xu, who has proven that he is still extremely strong for his age, is now walking around with his head held high! 

As for the three daughters-in-law, they are now shivering in fear. It doesn't matter if it's a son or a daughter because they would now have another person to serve. Oh god, how would they be able to live their lives now? 

After ten long months, Mrs. Xu finally gave birth to a cute little girl â€” Fu Bao. Her arrival entirely changed the Xu family. 

Fu Bao: 'Mother, I caught a rabbit!' 

Fu Bao: 'Father, is this gold?' 

Eldest Xu: 'Little sister, could you take a look at me and see if today is a good day to go into the woods?' 

Second Xu: 'Fu Bao~ Am I the brother that treats you the best?' 

Third Xu: 'Bao~ You have to wish me best of luck so that I'll pass my exam. I'll buy you beautiful clothes on your way home!' 

All her sisters-in-law: 'Oh dear, just leave it. We will do it instead!' 

>
